overview: We've picked the most desirable girls from the pages of Penthouse and sent them to Costa Rica - together - to do what they do best: be sexy, naked, and HOT ... for you! We've pulled no punches to make sure Tera Patrick (February 2000), Sunny Leone (March 2001), and Kyla Cole (March 2000) did everything possible to excite not only you the viewer, but one another as well. And they did ... guaranteed.
title: Penthouse: Pets in Paradise
